analysis.key_quote: Replacing the independent grant decision-making process with political appointees making decisions based on political or ideological criteria will CRIPPLE the productivity and validity of the US biomedical enterprise, and it will DESTROY the research ecosystem that has taken decades to develop.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization, loss of scientific integrity, and the importance of a merit-based system in grant funding decisions, indicating a clear stance against the rule.
